Package com.epam.services

Interface TransactionService

All Known Implementing Classes:
TransactionServiceImpl
public interface TransactionService
Interface for the Transaction Service. Provides methods to interact with the DAO and perform business logic.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hrebenozhko Ruslan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getUsersTransactionNumber(int userId)
    Retrieves the number of transactions for a user with the given ID.
    List<TransactionDTO>
    getUserTransaction(int userId, int page, int recordsPerPage)
    Retrieves a specified number of transactions for a user with the given ID, with pagination.

  • Method Details

    • getUserTransaction

      List<TransactionDTO> getUserTransaction(int userId, int page, int recordsPerPage) throws NoTransactionsFoundException, TransactionServiceException
      Retrieves a specified number of transactions for a user with the given ID, with pagination.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve transactions for
      page - the page number to retrieve
      recordsPerPage - the number of records to retrieve per page
      Returns:
      a list of TransactionDTO objects for the user
      Throws:
      NoTransactionsFoundException - if no transactions were found for the user
      TransactionServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer

    • getUsersTransactionNumber

      int getUsersTransactionNumber(int userId) throws TransactionServiceException
      Retrieves the number of transactions for a user with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve the number of transactions for
      Returns:
      the number of transactions for the user
      Throws:
      TransactionServiceException - if an error occurs in the DAO layer
